content: Hello, how has life been treating you lately ?
I have having a hard time feeling safe in any public place, especially where crowds gather and in locations that are not familiar.
I can understand why you' re having a hard time feeling safe in public places. What is making you feel that way?
I have no companion, such as a family member or friend, to go with.
I' m sure that it is tough. So you feel that your companionship is making things difficult for you?
